service_summary: Those times when something’s going on with your pet, and you need a pro to take a look. If it’s after-hours, a serious injury, or life-threatening illness, we’ll refer you to a 24-hour emergency hospital.
We’ll keep your pet safe from heartworm, bordetella and more — and send reminders when they’re due for a vaccine.
We’ll teach you techniques to help correct common dog behavior problems — it’s as much about training the human as the animal.
We perform oral, soft-tissue, and mass removal surgeries right here in our clinic
We’ll radiograph, scale and polish your pet’s teeth — which will make the kisses and licks much more pleasant.
It’s all in-house — we perform blood, urine and fecal tests, digital X-rays, and other tests on premises to provide fast and reliable results.
We provide nose-to-tail consultations to make sure yourpet is happy and healthy. And, if your pet is due for avaccination or needs other services, our vets willreview costs with you before proceeding
It’s a rite of passage in every dog’s and cat’s life — we’ll make it as painless and comfortable as possible.
